programme.title: Bush's first week and 'African-Americans'
programme.short_synopsis: Reverend Jessie Jackson's campaign for the recognition of the term 'African-American'.
programme.medium_synopsis: President Bush's failure to recall the date of the Pearl Harbour attack, and Reverend Jessie Jackson's attempt to instigate the use of the term 'African American'.
